de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.managedbeans

Class ActiveDocumentBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.managedbeans.ActiveDocumentBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named
 @SessionScoped
public class ActiveDocumentBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This bean opens the requested record and provides all data relevant to this record.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
